examples: They had to endure a long wait before the case came to trial.
Tuvieron que soportar una larga espera antes de que el caso llegara a juicio.
She could not endure the thought of parting.
No podía soportar la idea de separarse.
The pain was almost too great to endure.
El dolor era casi demasiado grande para soportarlo.
a love that endures all things and never fails
un amor que todo lo aguanta y nunca falla
